name: The Adventure Vol.1
description:
Caution: I found out that 32-bit OS can't run this game normally. I'm not sure because it was an old laptop, but I'm not sure it will work on 32-bit. Please tell me if it works on 32-bit OS.

"The Adventure Vol.1" is a puzzle platformer game made for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

The theme for 2021 is "Joined Together", so I tried to connect inside and outside of my game.

This game uses your Windows' volume settings.

Many things in this game interact with your system's volume.

Use A, D to move, W to jump, and R to restart.

Caution: Don't change your volume too fast. It can cause physics engine glitches.
